description:
11.37 colorhold
Remove all color information for all RGB colors except for certain one.

The filter accepts the following options:

blend.description: Blend percentage. 0.0 makes pixels fully gray. Higher values result in more preserved color.

color.description: The color which will not be replaced with neutral gray.

similarity.description: Similarity percentage with the above color. 0.01 matches only the exact key color, while 1.0 matches everything.

name: colorhold

parameters.description: The color which will not be replaced with neutral gray.
parameters.name: color

parameters.description: Similarity percentage with the above color. 0.01 matches only the exact key color, while 1.0 matches everything.
parameters.name: similarity

parameters.description: Blend percentage. 0.0 makes pixels fully gray. Higher values result in more preserved color.
parameters.name: blend

source:
11.37 colorhold

Remove all color information for all RGB colors except for certain one.

The filter accepts the following options:

color

The color which will not be replaced with neutral gray.

similarity

Similarity percentage with the above color. 0.01 matches only the exact key color, while 1.0 matches everything.

blend

Blend percentage. 0.0 makes pixels fully gray. Higher values result in more preserved color.
